description: The EOS R5 is the latest model in the EOS family. It is a mirrorless camera that features a 24.2 megapixel sensor, a built-in wide-angle lens, and a built-in flash.
The EOS R3 is the latest model in the EOS family. It is a mirrorless camera that features a 24.2 megapixel sensor, a built-in wide-angle lens, and a built-in flash.
Unprecedented 30fps burst shooting 8K video that doesn't overheat Hybrid CFexpress A and SD card slots
The Olympus OM-D E-M10 Mark IV is a mirrorless camera that features a 24.2 megapixel sensor, a built-in wide-angle lens, and a built-in flash.
10-minute limit for 4K video recording No weather sealing No water damage No dust damage
